title: The Business Rationales Domain Schema
description: Contains a list of rationales and comments about different aspects concerning the entity's current situation

Type.title: Business rationale type (enum)
Type.description: Description of a business rationale sent by a vendor, according to an enum list

TrType.title: Business rationale type (translateable)
TrType.description: Description of a business rationale sent by a vendor, according to an enum list

VendorId.title: Vendor id
VendorId.description: Vendor id to identify the text

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Order used to shot the list of rationales

Connotation.title: Rationale's connotation (enum)
Connotation.description: Shows the tendency or connotation of the value

Text.title: Full text
Text.description: Business rationale text. May include some HTML tags, like <b> or <q>
examples: <b>Se reflejan incidencias judiciales para PETROGAL, S.A consideradas de gravedad baja y/o media /b> , lo que sería indicativo que constan obligaciones administrativas y/o tributarias registradas en los organismos públicos de Portugal.
